articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Gmail’s new ‘Manage subscriptions’ tool will help declutter your inbox - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google announced on Tuesday that it's launching a new Gmail feature that is designed to help users easily manage their subscriptions and declutter their inbox.
articles.content: Google announced on Tuesday that it’s launching a new Gmail feature that is designed to help users easily manage their subscriptions and declutter their inboxes. The new “Manage subscriptions” tool i… [+2017 chars]
